description: LinkedIn posts from WU Yang to display on the news page. Add post URLs here to update the display. / 武洋的LinkedIn动态，显示在新闻页面。在此添加动态URL以更新显示内容。

how_to_add_posts: 1. Visit WU Yang's LinkedIn profile / 访问武洋的LinkedIn个人资料
2. Find a post that WU Yang shared (not just liked/reposted) / 找到武洋分享的动态（不仅仅是点赞/转发）
3. Click on the post to open it / 点击动态打开
4. Copy the URL from the browser address bar / 从浏览器地址栏复制URL
5. Add the URL to the 'posts' array below / 将URL添加到下方的'posts'数组中
6. Commit and push the changes / 提交并推送更改
instructions.note: Only original posts (not reposts) will display properly with LinkedIn embeds / 只有原创动态（非转发）才能通过LinkedIn嵌入正常显示
